name: No Time To Dye
description: Based on the Global Game Jam 2023 theme, "Roots", our game No Time To Dye connects to this through the idea of heritage and the physicality of hair on a human head. The game is about a girl who dyes her hair for picture day and her old-fashioned immigrant mother disapproves this decision. Thus, the girl runs away from her mother who chases her in their neighborhood. No Time To Dye is a unique endless runner game featuring 2D character sprites and a 3D interactable environment. Watch out for the fire hydrants and look before you cross!
